description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 2.x and 3.x before 3.3, and 8, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving (1) WebProcess.srv, (2) the html/en/default/ directory, (3) Widget/resource, (4) birt/frameset, or (5) ganttlib/gantt-jws.jnlp.
